description: Returns information about domain and node health, the standby Availability Zone, number of nodes per Availability Zone, and shard count per node.

nested_items.name: DomainState
nested_items.description: The current state of the domain.
Processing - The domain has updates in progress.
Active - Requested changes have been processed and deployed to the domain.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneCount
nested_items.description: The number of Availability Zones configured for the domain. If the service is unable to fetch this information, it will return NotAvailable.

nested_items.name: ActiveAvailabilityZoneCount
nested_items.description: The number of active Availability Zones configured for the domain. If the service is unable to fetch this information, it will return NotAvailable.

nested_items.name: StandByAvailabilityZoneCount
nested_items.description: The number of standby Availability Zones configured for the domain. If the service is unable to fetch this information, it will return NotAvailable.

nested_items.name: DataNodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of data nodes configured for the domain. If the service is unable to fetch this information, it will return NotAvailable.

nested_items.name: DedicatedMaster
nested_items.description: A boolean that indicates if dedicated master nodes are activated for the domain.

nested_items.name: MasterEligibleNodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of nodes that can be elected as a master node. If dedicated master nodes is turned on, this value is the number of dedicated master nodes configured for the domain. If the service is unable to fetch this information, it will return NotAvailable.

nested_items.name: WarmNodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of warm nodes configured for the domain.

nested_items.name: MasterNode
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the domain has an elected master node.

nested_items.name: ClusterHealth
nested_items.description: The current health status of your cluster.
Red - At least one primary shard is not allocated to any node.
Yellow - All primary shards are allocated to nodes, but some replicas aren't.
Green - All primary shards and their replicas are allocated to nodes.
NotAvailable - Unable to retrieve cluster health.

nested_items.name: TotalShards
nested_items.description: The total number of primary and replica shards for the domain.

nested_items.name: TotalUnAssignedShards
nested_items.description: The total number of primary and replica shards not allocated to any of the nodes for the cluster.

nested_items.name: EnvironmentInformation
nested_items.description: A list of EnvironmentInfo for the domain.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneInformation
nested_items.description: A list of AvailabilityZoneInfo for the domain.

nested_items.name: AvailabilityZoneName
nested_items.description: The name of the Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: ZoneStatus
nested_items.description: The current state of the Availability Zone. Current options are Active and StandBy.
Active - Data nodes in the Availability Zone are in use.
StandBy - Data nodes in the Availability Zone are in a standby state.
NotAvailable - Unable to retrieve information.

nested_items.name: ConfiguredDataNodeCount
nested_items.description: The total number of data nodes configured in the Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: AvailableDataNodeCount
nested_items.description: The number of data nodes active in the Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: TotalShards
nested_items.description: The total number of primary and replica shards in the Availability Zone.

nested_items.name: TotalUnAssignedShards
nested_items.description: The total number of primary and replica shards that aren't allocated to any of the nodes in the Availability Zone.
